name: Will (baloopi)
description:
In the world where everything you see and feel is monochromatic, is there even a point of color? Is there even a point to life when there's nothing but gray?

Explore these questions through Murphy's eyes as he is thrown into an otherworldly journey to help him regain the vivid colors that he has once lost in this short visual novel!

This game is purely story-based, without choices or multiple endings. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the unique tale of "Will". :)

Depending on popularity, there may be updates to this game that may include the possibility of choices or multiple endings, but the game is complete as it is currently.

I hope you enjoy the experience, and feel the colors of your emotion as you play through this game. :)
